description: Analyze, troubleshoot, and optimize Plaid integrations for banking data and financial account linking
author: Plaid
content: Connect Claude to Plaid for banking data integration and financial services troubleshooting.

steps: Add the Plaid server configuration with SSE transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport sse plaid https://api.dashboard.plaid.com/mcp/sse

troubleshooting.issue: Rate limit exceeded errors during API requests
troubleshooting.solution: Plaid enforces rate limits per endpoint. Check error_code and error_type in response body. Use request ID for support inquiries. Implement exponential backoff for retry logic. Monitor rate limit headers.

troubleshooting.issue: Item authentication failed or expired access token
troubleshooting.solution: Listen for PENDING_DISCONNECT webhook (US/CA) or PENDING_EXPIRATION (UK/EU). Send users through update mode before Items expire. Re-authenticate via Plaid Link. Check error_type for specific issue.

troubleshooting.issue: Webhook verification fails or not receiving webhooks
troubleshooting.solution: Verify webhook signature using Plaid's verification guide. Check webhook URL is publicly accessible. Test endpoint returns 200 status. Enable webhook logging in Dashboard. Review firewall/security group rules.

Use separate API keys for sandbox and production. Verify environment in Dashboard matches code. Check client_id and secret match environment. Test in sandbox before going live with production credentials.
